titles.title: HydroClear, Invisible Finish, Waterproof
titles.title2: Transparent waterproofing coating for masonry, tile, and concrete without altering the surface look.

product_overview: Transparent waterproofing coating for masonry, tile, and concrete without altering the surface look.
short_description: Invisible water-repellent that preserves natural surface aesthetics.
positioning: HydroClear Shield waterproofs tile, brick, and stone without changing how they look or feel.
key_features: Easy to maintain and long-lasting protection

features_benefits.benefit: Provides waterproofing without altering surface appearance
Allows natural vapor escape while blocking water ingress
Penetrates deeply into stone, tile, and brick
Prevents degradation and maintains clear finish
Low VOC water-based formula safe for interiors and exteriors

recommended_use.intro: Ideal for protecting natural masonry and decorative surfaces while maintaining their look.

application_system.label: Surface Prep

application_system.label: First Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply evenly with brush, roller, or spray

application_system.label: Second Coat
application_system.purpose: Reapply after 4 hrs for maximum waterproof protection

recommended_substrates.description: Natural stone facades and decorative stonework
Bathrooms, kitchens, and outdoor decorative tiling

surface_preparation: Ensure surfaces are clean and dust-free
Mask edges and joints before application

storage_safety: Store away from sunlight, sealed tightly
Keep in a cool, dry area

safety_first_aid.General: Wear protective gloves and ensure proper ventilation during application
safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Flush with plenty of clean water immediately
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Use in well-ventilated areas to avoid vapors
